project.name: QM 2023 Capstone Project
project.description: Semester-long capstone for Statistics II: Data Analytics

research_focus.primary_topic: Climate Change Impact on Real Estate and Housing Markets
research_questions: How does climate change affect predicted housing rates in the US?
What is the relationship between climate change risk measures and REIT performance?
How do public and investor reactions to climate change influence stock market performance?
Can we correlate climate change trends with REIT performance data?
research_objectives: Analyze REIT data and climate change risk measures
Determine if a correlation exists between climate trends and REIT performance
Project how climate change may influence the future housing market
Identify which generations are likely to be most affected

data_sources.description: Real Estate Investment Trust performance metrics
Based on Skiadopoulos et al. research paper
Public and investor reactions to climate change
